column1: Funeral service will be 2:00 p.m. Friday
column3: 2015 at the Jurrens Funeral Home Walton Chapel in Sibley
column4: with Rev. Emmanuel T. Naweji officiating.  Burial with military honors will follow at the Ocheyedan Township Cemetery in Ocheyedan
column5: IA.  Visitation will be 1:00 PM until time of service with family present at the Jurrens Funeral Home Walton Chapel of Sibley.
